author: Michael Douglas Pickerign

review: This is the most amazing technology of its kind to date.  Literally, just plug it in and you are watching Amazon Prime (and many others).  I have a Google Chromecast, but you need another device to stream to the stick.  Fire TV Stick is self contained... no device needed, just wifi.  And fast!  No noticeable buffering, just choose your entertainment and you are watching.
author: John Photo

review: The only thing I dont like is that you have to turn the TV completely off to get it to work.  Besides that it is great!

review: Doesn't work on my DLP Television but works great on the LCD. I bought this for use on the DLP so that was a disappointment. Overall pleased with this purchase.

review: I want to love it, wanted to throw it in the backpack for work or road trips and pop it into the TV at the hotel. Problem is that it won't open the webpage that most hotels use to add your credentials. Standard access point no problem but web based login is a no go for now.
